description: Display Workload Details Captured using Extended Events

list.definition:
select distinct srvname = sql_instance from dbo.instance_details with (nolock)
where is_available = 1 and is_enabled = 1
list.label: Sql Instance
list.name: server
list.query:
select distinct srvname = sql_instance from dbo.instance_details with (nolock)
where is_available = 1 and is_enabled = 1

list.label: Database
list.name: database

list.label: Is Local SQL Instance
list.name: is_local

list.label: IP Address
list.name: ip

list.label: Host Name
list.name: host_name

list.label: DBA Database
list.name: dba_db

list.label: XEvent Collection Time UTC
list.name: xevent_collection_time_utc

list.definition:
;with t_hours as (
	select [hour] = 0
	union all
	select [hour] = u.hour+1
	from t_hours u
	where u.hour < 23
)
select [hour] from t_hours
list.label: Hour
list.name: hour_of_day
list.query:
;with t_hours as (
	select [hour] = 0
	union all
	select [hour] = u.hour+1
	from t_hours u
	where u.hour < 23
)
select [hour] from t_hours

title: XEvent - Trend
